titleStmt.title: A letter from Edmund Ellis, a minister of the Church of England to John Norris, another minister of the same church in vindication of the Quakers from the charge of being Socinians.
titleStmt.author: Elys, Edmund, ca. 1634-ca. 1707.
Norris, John, 1657-1711.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
